mapper.select: select x.id,x.content,m.update_time from question x join (select q.parent_question,max(a.update_time) as update_time from answer a join question q on a.question_id = q.id group by q.parent_question)m on m.parent_question = x.id where not exists ( select 1 from (select * from question q where q.parent_question = x.id or x.id = q.id)y where not exists( select 1 from answer z where z.question_id = y.id ) ) and x.parent_question = x.id and x.a_id = #{userId} and x.del_flag = 0;
select id,content,update_time from question where a_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and answer_status = 0 and parent_question = id and del_flag = 0 order by update_time desc

select q.id,m.update_time,q.content from question q join (select q.parent_question,max(a.update_time) as update_time from answer a join question q on a.question_id = q.id group by q.parent_question)m on m.parent_question = q.id where not exists (select 1 from question x where not exists (select 1 from answer a where a.question_id = x.id ) and x.parent_question = q.id ) and q.parent_question = q.id and q.del_flag = 0 and q.q_id = #{userId} order by update_time desc;
select count(a.id) from answer a,question q where q.parent_question = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and q.a_id = #{a_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and q.q_id = #{q_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.question_id = q.id
select * from answer where question_id in (select id from question where parent_question = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a_id = #{a_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and del_flag = 0) order by update_time
mapper.delete: delete answer from question left join answer on question.id=answer.question_id where question.parent_question = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and question.a_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
